message: Let's start with a fair 50/50 split.
I think I deserve a bit more, how about 60/40?
Your offer was a bit too greedy. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.
Meet me in the middle of our last offers, 57/43?
This is getting us nowhere. I'm willing to come down slightly to 52/48.
I'll nudge up a bit from my last offer, 58/42. Let's close the deal.
Bob, we're running out of time. This is my final concession - 51/49. Take it or leave it.
